text.en: Manifestation of the Mañjughoṣa Guru’s1primordial wisdom,
Sublime friend and protector of the teachings and beings in this degenerate age,
text.en-trans: nyikdü ten dro kyobpé pungnyen chok

text.en: Jamyang Lodrö Gyatso, to you I pray:
Inspire me to realize the natural state!
May I see my own true face, primordially pure dharmakāya awareness,
text.en-trans: kadak rigpa chökü rang zhal tong

text.en: May the spontaneously present visions of clear light reach their full measure,
text.en-trans: lhündrub ösal nangwa tsé la peb

text.en: May whatever arises be freed in its own place through uncontrived action,
text.en-trans: gangshar chöpa machö rang sar drol

text.en: And may I actualize the fruition of the three kāyas present within the ground.
text.en-trans: ku sum zhir né drebu ngöngyur shok
